original: shes rab sna tshogs rnam pa smin//
analyzed: shes rab sna tshogs rnam pa smin//

original: rnam med dang ni rnam nyed bral //
analyzed: rnam med dang ni rnam nyed bral //
translated: Free from the absence of aspects and close to aspects.

original: 'di yi de nyid shes rab 'dod //
analyzed: 'di yi de nyid shes rab 'dod //

original: gang phyir 'gro ba khyab pa'i bdag / shes rab srid dang mnyam bdag nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro ba khyab pa'i bdag / shes rab srid dang mnyam bdag nyid //

original: sku gsum theg pa'i gsum pa 'dis //
analyzed: sku gsum theg pa'i gsum pa 'dis //
translated: This third of the three vehicles of the three bodies

original: de nyid 'khor lo bde ba'i thabs //
analyzed: de nyid 'khor lo bde ba'i thabs //
translated: Is the method of the wheel of bliss of reality.

original: de ni rnal 'byor bdag dang gzhan //
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor bdag dang gzhan //
translated: That is the yoga of self and other,

original: 'jam dpal rdo rje sgyu ma che //
analyzed: 'jam dpal rdo rje sgyu ma che //

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gzhan //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gzhan //

original: snang ba'i bye brag shes rab nyid //
analyzed: snang ba'i bye brag shes rab nyid //

original: de nyid rgyal ba'i bdag nyid grol //
analyzed: de nyid rgyal ba'i bdag nyid grol //
translated: That is the liberation of the nature of the victors.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa nyid //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa nyid //

original: gnyis dang gnyis med de bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis med de bzhin no //

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: dngos dang @140b dngos med gzung dang 'dzin //
analyzed: dngos dang @140b dngos med gzung dang 'dzin //

original: rnam par shes pas bor ba'i sems //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas bor ba'i sems //

original: dmigs pa med cing bla na med //
analyzed: dmigs pa med cing bla na med //

original: dag cing zhi ba snang ba med //
analyzed: dag cing zhi ba snang ba med //
translated: Pure, peaceful, and without appearance,

original: rig pa shes rab ces su grags //
analyzed: rig pa shes rab ces su grags //

analyzed: 'di la zhugs par gyur pa ni //
translated: Those who have entered this

analyzed: gsang sngags chos kyis rnam par gsal //

original: gang phyir sna tshogs pa yi thabs //
analyzed: gang phyir sna tshogs pa yi thabs //

analyzed: 'di la chung 'bring chen po yis //

analyzed: dag pa'i de nyid kha phyir bltas // ye shes phyag rgya snyoms 'jug pas //
translated: Is the outward-facing reality of purity.üîΩThe principal ones, such as Ma√±juvajra,

analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs gtso //
translated: Are the union of the j√±ƒÅnamudrƒÅ.

original: bden min brdzun gyi rnam pa min //
analyzed: bden min brdzun gyi rnam pa min //

analyzed: 'bring po'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid yin //

analyzed: bdag byin brlab pa'i go 'phang shes //
translated: Knowing the stage of the self-empowerment,

analyzed: gang phyir de nyid nus pa med //

analyzed: de rnams la ni yang dag bstan //

original: rim gyis byang chub grub pa'o //
analyzed: rim gyis byang chub grub pa'o //

original: lha rnams mngon par dgod ce na //
analyzed: lha rnams mngon par dgod ce na //

original: 'di la bag chags ci tshe med //
analyzed: 'di la bag chags ci tshe med //

original: bag chags nyid ni rnam dag na //
analyzed: bag chags nyid ni rnam dag na //
translated: When the latent tendencies themselves are purified,

original: thams cad du yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad du yang de bzhin no //
translated: Everything is just like that.

original: slar yang rnal 'byor de nyid mthong //
analyzed: slar yang rnal 'byor de nyid mthong //
translated: Again, one sees that very yoga,

original: phyag rgya che la mchog tu gzhol //
analyzed: phyag rgya che la mchog tu gzhol //
translated: And is supremely devoted to the great seal.üîΩThe supreme faculty abides

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi //üîΩdbang po mchog gis gnas par bya //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi // dbang po mchog gis gnas par bya //
translated: In the nature of all things.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi bde thob pas //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi bde thob pas //
translated: Having attained the bliss of one‚Äôs nature,

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs //

original: gang phyir 'gro ba de nyid yin //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro ba de nyid yin //

original: de phyir thams cad rtog pa med //
analyzed: de phyir thams cad rtog pa med //

original: phyi rol dngos yid kyis gzung la //
analyzed: phyi rol dngos yid kyis gzung la //

original: gang la 'khrul pa snang mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gang la 'khrul pa snang mi 'gyur //

original: rmi lam bud med gsal ba nyid //
analyzed: rmi lam bud med gsal ba nyid //
translated: The clear woman of a dream

original: sems can don ni byed pa ste ;
analyzed: sems can don ni byed pa ste ;
translated: Is one who acts for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: / thams cad dngos pa'i rang bzhin 'di //
analyzed: / thams cad dngos pa'i rang bzhin 'di //
translated: This nature of all things

original: sems tsam du 'gyur byang chub po //
analyzed: sems tsam du 'gyur byang chub po //
translated: Is mind only, and that is enlightenment.

original: sems kyi 'dod pa sems ma yin //
analyzed: sems kyi 'dod pa sems ma yin //
translated: The desire of the mind is not the mind.

original: rang gis rig pa sems min te //
analyzed: rang gis rig pa sems min te //
translated: Self-awareness is not the mind.

original: rig pa bla ma la stos 'gyur //
analyzed: rig pa bla ma la stos 'gyur //
translated: Awareness depends on the guru.

original: dngos med kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: dngos med kun gyi ngo bo nyid //

original: ming 'di mi 'dod pa ni gang //
analyzed: ming 'di mi 'dod pa ni gang //

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di //
translated: The nature of all entities

original: so sor rtogs par dka' ba yin //
analyzed: so sor rtogs par dka' ba yin //
translated: Is difficult to realize individually.

original: de la sogs pa 'dus pa na //
analyzed: de la sogs pa 'dus pa na //
translated: And so on, when they are assembled,

original: ji ltar 'di ni 'bras las zan //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di ni 'bras las zan //
translated: Just as this is food from rice,

original: de ltar de bzhin nyid dag la //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin nyid dag la //
translated: In that way, in pure suchness,

original: ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur //
translated: Ignorance becomes knowledge.

analyzed: gang la bsam pa bsam gtan yin // de la bsam mi khyab kyis min //
translated: Where there is thought, there is concentration.

original: bsam gyis mi @141a * //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi @141a * //
translated: There is no thought there,

original: khyab rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyab rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The inconceivable yoga.

original: sangs rgyas kyis ni grol bar bstan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis ni grol bar bstan //

original: 'di ni 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor yin //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor yin //

original: gang phyir phyag rgya che de nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir phyag rgya che de nyid //

original: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste //
translated: Because it is the Dharma, enjoyment, and emanation,

original: gang phyir de ni rnam kun yin //
analyzed: gang phyir de ni rnam kun yin //

original: bya ba byas pas bsam dang bral //
analyzed: bya ba byas pas bsam dang bral //
translated: Because the task is done, it is free from thought.

original: dogs pa kun la kha phyir bltas //
analyzed: dogs pa kun la kha phyir bltas //

original: spyod lam rnam pa bzhi ldan pa //
analyzed: spyod lam rnam pa bzhi ldan pa //

original: sangs rgyas 'di ni sangs rgyas bzhed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'di ni sangs rgyas bzhed //

original: gnyis med gnyis su med pas byas //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis su med pas byas //

original: bdag gis thob pa'i bsod nams kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis thob pa'i bsod nams kyis //
translated: by the merit I have obtained,

original: de ni 'gro ba gnyis med nyid //
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba gnyis med nyid //
translated: may there be no duality in the world,üîΩand by that may there be great bliss.

original: de yis bde ba chen por shog / aa wa dh'u t'i pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de yis bde ba chen por shog / aa wa dh'u t'i pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
